name: trackAll
signature: { <In>(input: In): <Type, Out>(self: Metric<Type, In, Out>) => <A, E, R>(effect: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R>; <Type, In, Out>(self: Metric<Type, In, Out>, input: In): <A, E, R>(effect: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R>; }
description:
Returns an aspect that will update this metric with the specified constant
value every time the aspect is applied to an effect, regardless of whether
that effect fails or succeeds.
